title: Schwarzkopf IGORA ROYAL 3-0 Dark Brown 60 ml by Unknown
description: Schwarzkopf Igora Royal Permanent Creme Hair Color 2oz/60ml (3-0)-Darkest Brown Natural Provides perfect results with the unique combination of Color Cream and Color & Care Developer for brilliant color performance. Color equalization. Long-lasting color with outstanding gray coverage. Fade resistant formula with brilliant shine. UV protection. Mixes twice as fast compared to other brands. Usage of color: Mixing ratio 1:1 Apply on dry hair. Allow to develop for 30 - 45 minutes. Use 3% Color & Care Developer when coloring darker. Use 6% Color & Care Developer for tone-on-tone, 1 tone lighter or coverage. Use 9% Color & Care Developer for coloring 1-2 tones lighter. Use 12% Color & Care Developer for coloring 2-3 tones lighter. For faded color or on previously tinted hair follow dual application with diluting color with water or conditioner for mid to ends hair shaft Additional heat is optional and reduces the developing time by a third.
